text: Bernard Ładysz (24 July 1922 – 25 July 2020) was a Polish opera singer and actor. His recordings include Lucia di Lammermoor (with Maria Callas) and The Devils of Loudon (with Tatiana Troyanos). He was born in Wilno, then Poland. His best known roles were in The Doll (1968), Ziemia obiecana (1974), The Quack (1982), Pierścień i róża (1986) and Ogniem i mieczem (1999). Ładysz died on 25 July 2020 in Warsaw, one day after his 98th birthday. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1922 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Polish singers Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish television actors Category:Polish stage actors Category:Polish writers
